main_definition: Of a larger or more extensive range, scope, or degree.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having a wider physical extent from side to side.
meanings_and_examples.example: The river was broader than usual after the heavy rainfall.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Comprehensive or inclusive of many different aspects, ideas, or perspectives.
meanings_and_examples.example: A broader approach is needed to tackle climate change effectively.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Extended in time; lasting longer than before.
meanings_and_examples.example: His career was now broader after he had gained a lot of experience over the years.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Becoming more lenient or tolerant, especially regarding rules or restrictions.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company decided to adopt a broader policy on dress code to accommodate diverse cultural backgrounds.
